entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:40 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
